overview:
Ryan Whitlie is a designer, specialising in graphics, web & front end development.

He was born in South Africa, moved the the UK at the age of 6 and currently resides in Newcastle Upon Tyne, England.

He started his design career working in graphics and interiors for a large North Eastern firm. From there he set up freelance, moving into web & branding before teaming up with a local web developer, Simon Loveday, to form the company Brighten.

Simon relocated to New Zealand in 2010, dissolving Brighten. From there, Ryan teamed up with a group of web entrepreneurs sharing the same vision. They formed Moosch Media where Ryan remains today.
